justification: Identifies B’s interest in established talent and friendly playoff schedules and addresses B’s QB/WR needs by dealing from RB depth. Separates aims (A consolidates into upside RB), but misses B’s urgency for immediate wins and contrarian tendencies. Trade is roster-coherent, though A losing its only fully healthy top QB conflicts with A’s injury-cautious profile. Rationale is concise but light on specifics.
